name: Infinite Backlog
description:
Is your Steam sale spending out of control? Do you find yourself with a seemingly-endless backlog of titles to get around to?

Get the sweet satisfaction of checking off game after neglected game with this monumental compendium of forgotten classics! Inside, you'll find hidden gems such as: 

* League of Clans
* SkyCraft II
* Not Enough Guns
* SUFFER: The Rise
* Waifu Explosion
* 1867: Birth

...and many more! In fact, if you can think of a game, you can find it here! Just search for your favorite game, and enjoy!
